song.title: Susanne (Another Sometime)
song.info:
What happens when you try to combine the very nice voice of Rose with a remixed 8-bit-track from the “C64” composed by Marc Fischer ?!
Another Remix ;)
Actually i also used some parts of the vocals by Shannon Hurley’s “Shame” (thats why i upload the here too). The remix has a lil 80s touch to it, which fits the voice very good. But i know i have a strange taste -.-
Hopefully this works for you… Because i really like the original song in the way it is, my remix had to go in a completely different direction…i just hope that Rose & Shannon dont mind what i did to their voice !?
Anyway…. Enjoy the listening !!
